^SoulShards-(\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+)-univers.description: Soul Shards allows you to create a Soul Shard that absorbs the souls of monsters you kill to be inserted into a Soul Cage later. This Soul Cage is a special block that can spawn the type of mob your Soul Shard was absorbing, usually at much better rates than a vanilla monster spawner.
^SoulShards-(\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+)-univers.name: SoulShards

^MFFS_v(3\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+|3\\.\\d+\.name: Modular Force Field System
